page.title: 15N.Upottery: Leisure 2
page.content: We had a Crafts and Hobbies display in connection with the Flower Festival this summer and it was abundantly clear that a lot of our leisure time was spent on creative work of a very varied range.These are individual pastimes,but we do get together a great deal for communal activities, more so,I think,than in the towns. Going to the theatre is often a group expedition,organised by ,for instance, the W.I.This organisation,the Sports Clubs,the Mothers'Union,the Bellringers,the Young Farmers(famed as a matrimonial agency!),the Whist Club,the Church in Upottery and the Baptists in Smeatharpe keep us all busy:and the number of charity sales, garden parties,sponsored this and that,classes,coffee mornings and dramatic productions is endless.
